General.Name: NetObjects Inc
General.GicIndustry: Internet Software & Services (discontinued effective close of September 28, 2018)
General.GicSubIndustry: Internet Software & Services (discontinued effective close of September 28, 2018)
General.Description: NetObjects Inc. provides web design software and templates. The company offers NetObjects Fusion, a web design software that enables to build, manage, and promote websites; and NetObjects Fusion Essentials, a free drag-and-drop website builder. It also provides NetObjects Mosaic, an online application for mobile website designing; and publishes website for photographers. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Doylestown, Pennsylvania.
General.Address: 73 Old Dublin Pike, Doylestown, PA, United States, 18901
